createapp.name: CreateApp
createapp.description: Grants permission to create an application configuration to migrate on-premise application onto AWS

createreplicationjob.name: CreateReplicationJob
createreplicationjob.description: Grants permission to create a job to migrate on-premise server onto AWS

deleteapp.name: DeleteApp
deleteapp.description: Grants permission to delete an existing application configuration

deleteapplaunchconfiguration.name: DeleteAppLaunchConfiguration
deleteapplaunchconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete launch configuration for an existing application

deleteappreplicationconfiguration.name: DeleteAppReplicationConfiguration
deleteappreplicationconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete replication configuration for an existing application

deleteappvalidationconfiguration.name: DeleteAppValidationConfiguration
deleteappvalidationconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete validation configuration for an existing application

deletereplicationjob.name: DeleteReplicationJob
deletereplicationjob.description: Grants permission to delete an existing job to migrate on-premise server onto AWS

deleteservercatalog.name: DeleteServerCatalog
deleteservercatalog.description: Grants permission to delete the complete list of on-premise servers gathered into AWS

disassociateconnector.name: DisassociateConnector
disassociateconnector.description: Grants permission to disassociate a connector that has been associated

generatechangeset.name: GenerateChangeSet
generatechangeset.description: Grants permission to generate a changeSet for the CloudFormation stack of an application

generatetemplate.name: GenerateTemplate
generatetemplate.description: Grants permission to generate a CloudFormation template for an existing application

getapp.name: GetApp
getapp.description: Grants permission to get the configuration and statuses for an existing application

getapplaunchconfiguration.name: GetAppLaunchConfiguration
getapplaunchconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get launch configuration for an existing application

getappreplicationconfiguration.name: GetAppReplicationConfiguration
getappreplicationconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get replication configuration for an existing application

getappvalidationconfiguration.name: GetAppValidationConfiguration
getappvalidationconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get validation configuration for an existing application

getappvalidationoutput.name: GetAppValidationOutput
getappvalidationoutput.description: Grants permission to get notification sent from application validation script.

getconnectors.name: GetConnectors
getconnectors.description: Grants permission to get all connectors that have been associated

getmessages.name: GetMessages
getmessages.description: Grants permission to gets messages from AWS Server Migration Service to Server Migration Connector

getreplicationjobs.name: GetReplicationJobs
getreplicationjobs.description: Grants permission to get all existing jobs to migrate on-premise servers onto AWS

getreplicationruns.name: GetReplicationRuns
getreplicationruns.description: Grants permission to get all runs for an existing job

getservers.name: GetServers
getservers.description: Grants permission to get all servers that have been imported

importappcatalog.name: ImportAppCatalog
importappcatalog.description: Grants permission to import application catalog from AWS Application Discovery Service

importservercatalog.name: ImportServerCatalog
importservercatalog.description: Grants permission to gather a complete list of on-premise servers

launchapp.name: LaunchApp
launchapp.description: Grants permission to create and launch a CloudFormation stack for an existing application

listapps.name: ListApps
listapps.description: Grants permission to get a list of summaries for existing applications

notifyappvalidationoutput.name: NotifyAppValidationOutput
notifyappvalidationoutput.description: Grants permission to send notification for application validation script

putapplaunchconfiguration.name: PutAppLaunchConfiguration
putapplaunchconfiguration.description: Grants permission to create or update launch configuration for an existing application

putappreplicationconfiguration.name: PutAppReplicationConfiguration
putappreplicationconfiguration.description: Grants permission to create or update replication configuration for an existing application

putappvalidationconfiguration.name: PutAppValidationConfiguration
putappvalidationconfiguration.description: Grants permission to put validation configuration for an existing application

sendmessage.name: SendMessage
sendmessage.description: Grants permission to send message from Server Migration Connector to AWS Server Migration Service

startappreplication.name: StartAppReplication
startappreplication.description: Grants permission to create and start replication jobs for an existing application

startondemandappreplication.name: StartOnDemandAppReplication
startondemandappreplication.description: Grants permission to start a replication run for an existing application

startondemandreplicationrun.name: StartOnDemandReplicationRun
startondemandreplicationrun.description: Grants permission to start a replication run for an existing replication job

stopappreplication.name: StopAppReplication
stopappreplication.description: Grants permission to stop and delete replication jobs for an existing application

terminateapp.name: TerminateApp
terminateapp.description: Grants permission to terminate the CloudFormation stack for an existing application

updateapp.name: UpdateApp
updateapp.description: Grants permission to update an existing application configuration

updatereplicationjob.name: UpdateReplicationJob
updatereplicationjob.description: Grants permission to update an existing job to migrate on-premise server onto AWS
